meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Christina Bussmann Dante Atkins Joe Bartolomeo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7440.

td.p: Christina Bussmann, a social worker from Columbus, Ohio
Dante Atkins, a Congressional press secretary from Washington, D.C.
Joe Bartolomeo, a professor and associate dean from Florence, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,000)

tr.td: CHILD REARING
STATE CAPITAL EVENTS
U.S. MILITARY MEN
BIBLE BOOK 'EM
2-LETTER WORDS
I MARRIED A MUSICIAN

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
